entry.def: When an actor is downstage or moves downstage, he or she is or moves towards the front part of the stage.

example.ex: Krishna stands downstage in the open area.
example.tran: 克里斯娜站在舞台前部的开阔区域。

means.word_mean: 1. of the front half of a stage
1. at or toward the front of the stage;

sentences.sentence: "the actors moved further and further downstage"
